# DMMVC Quick Start Guide

Get started with DMMVC in 5 minutes!

## ðŸš€ One-Line Installation

### Linux/macOS
```bash
git clone https://github.com/dedomorozoff/dmmvc && cd dmmvc && chmod +x scripts/quickstart.sh && ./scripts/quickstart.sh
```

### Windows
```bash
git clone https://github.com/dedomorozoff/dmmvc && cd dmmvc && scripts\quickstart.bat
```

## ðŸ“¦ What You Get

- **MVC Framework** - Clean architecture
- **CLI Tool** - Code generation
- **Database Support** - SQLite, MySQL, PostgreSQL
- **Authentication** - Built-in auth system
- **Templates** - Go templates with layouts
- **API Ready** - RESTful API support
- **WebSocket** - Real-time communication
- **Swagger** - API documentation
- **Docker** - Container ready

## ðŸŽ¯ Quick Commands

```bash
# Create CRUD
dmmvc make:crud Product

# Create Controller
dmmvc make:controller About

# Create Model
dmmvc make:model Category

# Run Server
go run cmd/server/main.go

# Run Tests
go test ./...
```
